content.text: INEC will hold the supplementary elections on March 9 , the same day as the earlier scheduled governorship and state Houses of Assembly elections . Festus Okoye , INEC 's national commissioner for information and voter education , said the supplementary polls will be conducted in areas where the poll was cancelled last Saturday , alongside the governorship and state houses of assembly elections . He said the decision was reached during the commission 's meeting with resident electoral commissioners ( RECs ) on Thursday in Abuja . INEC had cancelled the presidential elections in some areas as a result of violence in River state as well as other parts of Lagos and Anambra states . Source : https://www.twitter.com/inecnigeria/status/1101442933755133952/photo/2
